|brand = ASUS |model = WL-500g |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = R2.40 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/08/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Asus_WL-500g |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQWL500G, MSQWL120G |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4702;BCM4702KPB; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = BMIPS3300 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 125 <!-- 125 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Parallel |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = AMD;Am29LV320DT-90EI;AM29lV320DT; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = 3801088
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM638165TS-6;or TIC T54C364164VT-6A; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM5325A2;BCM5325A2KQM; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0C:6E |oui = 00:0C:6E
|bootwait = on |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI,USB 1.1,Parallel |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_parallel = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = print server |addchip = Printer Port Controller;Attansic;AT7601F;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, Oleg (wl500g), OpenWrt (Was), TomatoUSB
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/06/2003 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = ASUS WL-120g v1 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4306;BCM4306KFB; |rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2050; |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 5 |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The '''[[ASUS]]''' logo and "WL-500G R0.7" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/hardware/asus ASUS routers on '''OpenWrt'''] *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asus_routers Asus routers on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?8-WL-500g-Internal-Photo-s Internal photo on '''wl500g''' forums]
